Name: Madden NFL 10
Overview:
Madden NFL 10 is the 2009 installment of the Madden NFL franchise, the officially licensed game of the NFL. The game, as with all recent previous installments in the series, was released for all major console platforms of the time.

The X360 and PS3 version of the game features a new animation technology which EA named 'Pro-Tak' which was designed to give players more control over the players in the game. It also features new TV-style presentation and cameras, and enhancements to the long-standard Franchise mode, including the ability to draft players, sign free agents, and manage the teams salary cap.
